accessories.name: Adventure Pack
accessories.description:
Enhance the Adventure appearance of the Honda Transalp and prepare it for any road condition by adding Adventure Pack which contains the following accessories:
• Radiator Grill (08F74-MLC-D00)
• Front Side Pipe (08P72-MLC-D00)
• Front Fog Light (08V73-MKS-E00)
• Front Fog Light Attachment (08V70-MLC-D00)

The Guard Attachment (08P74-MLC-D00) is required to install the pack.

accessories.name: Comfort Pack
accessories.description:
Optimise the comfort level of your Transalp with the Comfort Pack which contains the following accessories:
• Tank Bag 3L (08L89-MKS-E00)
• Fairing deflector (08R70-MLC-D00)
• Windscreen deflector (08R72-MLC-D00)
• Comfort Pillion Steps (08R71-MJP-G50)
• Acc Socket (08U71-MKK-D00)
• Clamp Cord (08E01-HAC-J00)

accessories.name: Plus Pack.
accessories.description:
Fully equip your Transalp with all essential accessories to maximise the riding experience on a short ride or continent-crossing trip.
This pack contains the following accessories:
• 50L Top Box Base (08L70-MLC-D00ZA)
• Pannier Cases	(08L72-MKT-D00)
• Pannier Support Stay (08L72-MLC-D00)
• 50L Top Box (08L73-MKT-D00)
• Pannier Panel Set (Aluminium) (08L80-MKT-D00)
• Aluminium Top Box Panel (08L83-MKT-D00)
• 3L Tank Bag (08L89-MKS-E00)
• 1 Key Components (Cylinder Inner Kit) (08M70-MJE-D03) x3
• Main Stand (08M70-MLC-D00)
• Skid Plate (08P71-MLC-D00)
• Front Side Pipe (08P72-MLC-D00)
• Engine Guard (08P73-MLC-D00)
• Engine Guard Attachment (08P74-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guards (08P77-MLC-D00)
• Fairing Deflector (08R70-MLC-D00)
• Windscreen Deflector (08R72-MLC-D00)
• Tall Windscreen (08R73-MLC-D00)
• Top Box Backrest (08R74-MLF-E00ZA)
• Heated Grips (08T70-MLC-D00)
• Front Fog Light Attachment (08V70-MLC-D00)
• Front LED Fog Lights (08V73-MKS-E00)

accessories.name: Rally Pack - Tri-Colour
accessories.description:
This pack contains a variety of accessories designed to maximise the off-road capabilities of the Transalp. The Pack includes:
• Skid Plate (08P71-MLC-D00)
• Engine Guard (08P73-MLC-D00)
• Guard Attachment (08P74-MLC-D00)
• Quick Shifter (08U70-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guard (08P77-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guard Extension *NH196* Tri Colour (08P72-MKS-E00ZB)
• Rally Step (08R79-MKS-E00)

accessories.name: Rally Pack - Black
accessories.description:
This pack contains a variety of accessories designed to maximise the off-road capabilities of the Transalp. The Pack includes:
• Skid Plate (08P71-MLC-D00)
• Engine Guard (08P73-MLC-D00)
• Guard Attachment (08P74-MLC-D00)
• Quick Shifter (08U70-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guard (08P77-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guard Extension *NH-1* Black (08P72-MKS-E00ZC)
• Rally Step (08R79-MKS-E00)

accessories.name: Tour Pack
accessories.description:
Enhance the Transalp's long distance travelling capabilities with the Touring Pack. The Pack includes:
• Pannier Case (R26,L33) (08L72-MKT-D00)
• Pannier Inner Bags (08L78-MKT-D00)
• Panel R/L Pannier (08L80-MKT-D00)
• Pannier Support Stay (08L72-MLC-D00)
• Key system inner cylinder x2 (08M70-MJE-D03)
• Grip Heaters (08T70-MLC-D00)

accessories.name: Urban Pack
accessories.description:
The Urban pack includes a variety of accessories that make the Transalp an excellent daily commuter. The Pack includes:
• 50L Manual Top Box (08L73-MKT-D00)
• Top Box Pad (Cushion) *BLACK BLACK* (08R74-MLF-E00ZA)
• Key system inner cylinder (08M70-MJE-D03)
• 50L Top Box Base (08L70-MLC-D00ZA)
• 25L Top Box Inner Bag (08L77-MKT-D00)
• Aluminium Panel Top Box (08L83-MKT-D00)
• High Screen (08R73-MLC-D00)
• Main Stand (08M70-MLC-D00)

accessories.name: Clamp Cord
accessories.description: Use this clamp cord to settled your luggage on luggage base

accessories.name: Easy Deflectors Kit
accessories.description:
Wind and weather protection are enhanced by the Deflectors which improves rider comfort by reducing traveling air around the rider’s arms, chest and shoulders.

This kit includes:
• Fairing deflector (08R70-MLC-D00)
• Windscreen deflector (08R72-MLC-D00)

accessories.name: Front Fog Lights Kit
accessories.description:
Set of 2 additional front LED headlights with all necessary components for the fitment to the front side pipe (not included). Helps to increase the rider's visibility and make them more noticeable for the surrounding traffic. Operated directly with the handlebar switch and signaled on the TFT monitor when activated. 

This kit includes:
• Front Fog Light (08V73-MKS-E00)
• Front Fog Light Attachment (08V70-MLC-D00)

accessories.name: Main Stand
accessories.description: The Main Stand allows secure parking on a variety of ground surfaces and assists with maintenance operations.

accessories.name: Windscreen Deflector
accessories.description: Wind and weather protection are enhanced by the fairing deflector which improves comfort by reducing traveling air around the rider’s chest and shoulders.

accessories.name: Comfort Pillion Footpegs
accessories.description: The comfort pillion footpegs constructed of aluminium and rubber that are wider than the standard pegs for increased comfort.

accessories.name: Fairing Deflector
accessories.description: Wind and weather protection are enhanced by this deflector which is attached to the windscreen and improves comfort by reducing traveling air around the rider’s arms.

accessories.name: Tall Windscreen
accessories.description: The height of the standard screen is extended by 75mm to increase rider and pillion comfort by maximising wind and weather protection. The strong polycarbonate surface features the Honda logo is scratch-resistant. No additional hardware required for the installation as it is directly mounted in replacement of the standard screen.

accessories.name: Low Seat - Black
accessories.description: The Low Seat is 20 mm lower than standard and features the same design as the standard seat.

accessories.name: Heated Grips
accessories.description: Extremely slim heated grips focusing on the area of the hands most sensitive to cold with a 5-level integrated controller for maximum rider comfort. Operated with the handlebar switch, the TFT monitor displays the temperature level when in use and an integrated circuit protects the battery from draining. The last level selected is memorized when the ignition is switched off.

accessories.name: 12V Socket Kit
accessories.description: Power or charge electrical equipment using this convenient 12V Socket (Provides 2A).

accessories.name: Front Fog Light Attachment
accessories.description:
Attachment required to install the additional Fog Lights on the Front Side Pipe.

Not included:
Front Led Fog Light
Front Side Pipe

accessories.name: Front LED Fog Lights
accessories.description:
Set of 2 additional Front LED Fog Lights that will increase the rider's visibility and make them more noticeable to surrounding traffic. 

All Attachments sold separately.

accessories.name: Wheel Stripes - White
accessories.description: These colour-matching wheel stripes featuring the Transalp logo, add a sporty design element to the wheel rims. The kit includes 8 stripes to fit both wheels. Designed to match the Ross White (Tricolor) bike.

accessories.name: Wheel Stripes - Grey
accessories.globalName: WHEEL STRIPE MAT IRIDIUM GRAY METALLIC
accessories.description: These colour-matching wheel stripes featuring the Transalp logo, add a sporty design element to the wheel rims. The kit includes 8 stripes to fit both wheels. Designed to match the Mat Ballistic Black Metallic & Mat Iridium Gray Metallic bikes

accessories.name: Easy Pannier Kit
accessories.description:
Set of 2 panniers to perfectly match the Transalp's design. The Honda 1-Key system allows the rider to operate the panniers by using the main ignition key.
Capacity: Right = 26L / Left = 33L
Dimensions (both sides): 430mm x 460mm x 260mm
Maximum load capacity (both sides): 6 kg

accessories.name: 50L Top Box Kit
accessories.description:
With a large capacity of 50L, this plastic top box can store up to two helmets. The Honda one key system allows the rider to operate the top box by using the main ignition key.

This kit includes:
• 50L Manual Top Box (08L73-MKT-D00)
• Top Box Pad (Cushion) BLACK (08R74-MLF-E00ZA)
• Key system inner cylinder (08M70-MJE-D03)
• 50L Top Box Base (08L70-MLC-D00ZA)
• 25L Top Box Inner Bag (08L77-MKT-D00)
• Aluminium Panel Top Box (08L83-MKT-D00)

accessories.name: 50L Top Box Base
accessories.description: Base featuring luggage hooks and required for fitment of the 50L Top Box.

accessories.name: Pannier Cases
accessories.description:
Set of 2 panniers with a 26L capacity on the right side, and 33L on the left. The Honda One-key system allows rider to open and close the panniers by using the main key.

Not included:
・Panniers cases stay (08L75-MKT-D00)
・Rear Carrier (08L74-MKT-D00ZC)
・2 x Key System Inner Cylinder (08M70-MJE-D03)
・Colour matched Pannier Panel

accessories.name: Pannier Support Stay
accessories.description: Brackets and supports needed to mount the pannier cases.

accessories.name: 50L Top Box
accessories.description:
50L Top Box that can accommodate up to two helmets. The built-in key cylinder can be used to lock the top box even when is removed from the carrier. 

Not included:
・Top Box Backrest
・Rear Carrier
・1 Key Components

accessories.name: Top Box Inner Bag (25L)
accessories.description: Black 25L Inner Bag with the Honda Wing Logo and an adjustable shoulder strap for easy carrying.

accessories.name: Pannier Inner Bag Set
accessories.description: A set of two fashionable black pannier inner bags with black zippers and discrete Honda Wing logo. Boasting spacious carrying capacity plus shoulder strap, these bags fit the Right (26L) & Left (33L) panniers perfectly.

accessories.name: Pannier Panel Set (Aluminium)
accessories.description: Give your panniers a premium touch with this set of aluminium design panels. Pannier Cases Sold Separately.

accessories.name: Inner Bag for 58L Top Box
accessories.description: This Inner Bag featuring the Honda Wing Logo is specially designed for use with the 58L Top Box. Features waterproof material and a shoulder strap for convenient carrying.

accessories.name: Aluminium Top Box Panel
accessories.description: Brushed aluminium design panel to fit the 50L Top Box (Top Box Sold Separately).

accessories.name: 3L Tank Bag
accessories.description: This light and compact Tank Bag has a clear pocket and smaller item pocket to keep personal items secure. Installation combining a one-touch buckle and magnet achieves both reliable fixation and simple removal when required.

accessories.name: 1 Key Components (Cylinder Inner Kit)
accessories.description: Main key locking components - allows the top box to be used with the bike's ignition key. One set required per Pannier or Top Box.

accessories.name: Top Box Backrest - Black Stitching
accessories.description: Designed to match with the 50L Top Box, this backrest is made to enhance pillion comfort on a longer ride. We advise fitting this backrest if the bike has its standard seat fitted to benefit from matching black stitching.

accessories.name: Engine Guard Kit
accessories.description:
The Engine Guard helps to protect the engine in case of a fall or collision while enhancing the bike's adventure image. Made of stainless steel and finished with electrolytic polishing, it is resistant to corrosion and easy to clean.

This kit includes:
• Engine Guard (08P73-MLC-D00)
• Guard Attachment (08P74-MLC-D00)

accessories.name: Knuckle Guards Kit - White
accessories.globalName: KNUCKLE GUARD EASY KIT ROSS WHITE
accessories.description:
The Knuckle Guards improve rider comfort by offering additional wind protection to the rider's hands and helps shield against adverse weather.

This kit includes:
• Knuckle Guard (08P77-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guard Extension *NH-196* Ross White (08P72-MKS-E00ZB)

accessories.name: Knuckle Guards Kit - Black
accessories.description:
The Knuckle Guards improve rider comfort by offering additional wind protection to the rider's hands and helps shield against adverse weather.

This kit includes:
• Knuckle Guard (08P77-MLC-D00)
• Knuckle Guard Extension *NH-1* Black (08P72-MKS-E00ZC)

accessories.name: Radiator Grill
accessories.description: Stainless Steel Radiator Grill that features the TRANSALP logo. Features an original mesh pattern combining cooling capability a with protective function that reduces potential damage to the radiator core from debris.

accessories.name: Tank Side Stickers - Blue
accessories.description:
These tank side stickers feature the Transalp logo and are designed to give additional knee grip when riding off-road. The special surface treatment makes them resistant to scratches and stone chips when driving on rough roads or off-roading, while their flexible sheet makes them easy to install on the tank surface.
Material: PVC
Surface treatment: Dimple treatment

accessories.name: Tank Side Pads - Black
accessories.globalName: TANK SIDE STICKERS MAT IRIDIUM GREY
accessories.description:
These tank side stickers feature the Transalp logo and are designed to give additional knee grip when riding off-road. The special surface treatment makes them resistant to scratches and stone chips when driving on rough roads or off-roading, while their flexible sheet makes them easy to install on the tank surface.
Material: PVC
Surface treatment: Dimple treatment

accessories.name: Tank Side Stickers - Grey
accessories.globalName: TANK SIDE STICKERS MAT BALLISTIC BLACK METALLIC
accessories.description:
These tank side stickers feature the Transalp logo and are designed to give additional knee grip when riding off-road. The special surface treatment makes them resistant to scratches and stone chips when driving on rough roads or off-roading, while their flexible sheet makes them easy to install on the tank surface
Material: PVC
Surface treatment: Dimple treatment

accessories.name: Skid Plate
accessories.description:
The skid plate consists of a 2.5 mm thick aluminum plate with excellent strength and corrosion resistance. It is designed to protect the area around and below the engine like the oil filter and exhaust. Shaped to fit perfectly with the engine guard for a more compact and protected lower engine area.

Material: Aluminum (t: 2.5)
Surface treatment: Hairline finish +
Color: colorless

To install the Skid Plate, Engine Guard (08P73-MLCA-D000) and Engine Guard ATT (08P74-MLCA-D0000) are required.

accessories.name: Knuckle Guard Extensions - White
accessories.description: Colour-matched Knuckle Guard Extensions improves comfort and the protection of the rider's hands.

accessories.name: Knuckle Guard Extensions - Black
accessories.description: Colour-matched Knuckle Guard Extensions improves comfort and the protection of the rider's hands.

accessories.name: Front Side Pipe
accessories.description:
The steel side pipes reduce damage to the motorcycle fairings and sensitive areas in case of fall or damage while providing an enhanced adventure look.
This accessory is required when installing the Fog Lights.
Material: Steel
Surface treatment: Painted
Color: Silver
08P74-MLC-D00 is required for fitment

accessories.name: Engine Guard
accessories.description:
The Engine Guard protects the engine frame in case of fall or collision, while providing an enhanced adventure appearance to the motorcycle. Made of steel and finished in Mat Beta Silver Metallic colour, this accessory is required to fit the Skid Plate onto the Transalp.

To install the engine guard, the Guard Attachment is required (sold separately).

accessories.name: Engine Guard Attachment
accessories.description: Attachment required to mount the Engine Guard and Skid Plate.

accessories.name: Knuckle Guards
accessories.description: The Knuckle Guards improve the rider's comfort by protecting the hands against wind and adverse weather conditions.

accessories.name: Rally Pegs Kit
accessories.description: With their aggressive spike shape and a surface 57% larger than standard, these Rally Steps improve the stability and control during off-road riding. The Rally Step Kit decreases boot slip thanks to their wide tread and aggressive spike shape.

accessories.name: Quickshifter
accessories.description: The Quickshifter allows clutch-less gear changes, with auto-blipper function for smooth and instant shifting. This enables stress-free riding not only for sports riding but also for long distance touring. Features adjustable operation load in three stages.
